alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, southeastern Bay, southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 444 PM EDT/344 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek to 10 miles east of Callaway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Kinard, Lewis, Nixon Garden, Broad Branch and Chipola Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Liberty
